column3: College of Medical and Dental Sciences
column5: The MSc Genomic Medicine Programme aims to equip students with a multi-disciplinary perspective on genomics and its applications to clinical practice and medical research. The Programme's modular design offers full-time and part-time studies with Postgraduate Masters, Diploma and Certificate
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
